member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode
member.summary: Opcodes for the behavior model bytecode interpreter. Stack-based instruction set designed for per-frame evaluation.

remarks.para: All values are stored as doubles to avoid boxing and enable simple stack operations. Booleans are represented as 0.0 (false) and 1.0 (true).
IMPORTANT: This enum must stay byte-compatible with the client SDK version in sdk-sources/Behavior/Runtime/BehaviorOpcode.cs

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.PushConst
member.summary: Push constant from pool. Operand: pool index (1 byte).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.PushInput
member.summary: Push input variable. Operand: input index (1 byte).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.PushLocal
member.summary: Push local variable. Operand: local index (1 byte).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.StoreLocal
member.summary: Store to local variable. Operand: local index (1 byte).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Pop
member.summary: Pop and discard top of stack.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Dup
member.summary: Duplicate top of stack.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Swap
member.summary: Swap top two stack values.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.PushString
member.summary: Push string index. Operand: string table index (2 bytes).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Add
member.summary: Add: push(pop() + pop()).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Sub
member.summary: Subtract: push(a - b) where b=pop(), a=pop().

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Mul
member.summary: Multiply: push(pop() * pop()).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Div
member.summary: Divide: push(a / b) where b=pop(), a=pop(). Returns 0 if b=0.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Mod
member.summary: Modulo: push(a % b) where b=pop(), a=pop(). Returns 0 if b=0.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Neg
member.summary: Negate: push(-pop()).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Eq
member.summary: Equal: push(a == b ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Ne
member.summary: Not equal: push(a != b ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Lt
member.summary: Less than: push(a < b ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Le
member.summary: Less or equal: push(a <= b ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Gt
member.summary: Greater than: push(a > b ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Ge
member.summary: Greater or equal: push(a >= b ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.And
member.summary: Logical AND: push((a != 0 && b != 0) ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Or
member.summary: Logical OR: push((a != 0 || b != 0) ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Not
member.summary: Logical NOT: push(pop() == 0 ? 1.0 : 0.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Jmp
member.summary: Unconditional jump. Operand: target offset (2 bytes).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.JmpIf
member.summary: Jump if truthy. Operand: target offset (2 bytes). Pops condition.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.JmpUnless
member.summary: Jump if falsy. Operand: target offset (2 bytes). Pops condition.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Call
member.summary: Call subroutine. Operand: target offset (2 bytes).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Ret
member.summary: Return from subroutine.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Halt
member.summary: Halt execution.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.SwitchJmp
member.summary: Switch/jump table. Operand: case count (1 byte), followed by offsets.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.SetOutput
member.summary: Set output variable. Operand: output index (1 byte). Pops value.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.EmitIntent
member.summary: Emit intent. Operand: channel (1 byte). Pops [action_idx, urgency].

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Rand
member.summary: Push random value [0.0, 1.0).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.RandInt
member.summary: Push random integer [min, max]. Pops [min, max].

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Lerp
member.summary: Linear interpolation. Pops [a, b, t], pushes a + (b-a)*t.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Clamp
member.summary: Clamp value. Pops [value, min, max], pushes clamped result.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Abs
member.summary: Absolute value: push(|pop()|).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Floor
member.summary: Floor: push(floor(pop())).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Ceil
member.summary: Ceiling: push(ceil(pop())).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Min
member.summary: Minimum: push(min(pop(), pop())).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Max
member.summary: Maximum: push(max(pop(), pop())).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.ContinuationPoint
member.summary: Continuation point for streaming composition. Operand: continuation point index (2 bytes).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.ExtensionAvailable
member.summary: Check if extension is available at continuation point. Operand: continuation point index (2 bytes). Pushes 1.0 if available, 0.0 otherwise.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.YieldToExtension
member.summary: Yield control to attached extension. Operand: continuation point index (2 bytes).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Breakpoint
member.summary: Breakpoint (debug builds only).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Trace
member.summary: Trace message. Operand: string table index (2 bytes).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Bytecode.BehaviorOpcode.Nop
member.summary: No operation.

member.summary: Compiles ABML expression AST into bytecode. Thread-safe: each compilation uses its own state.

member.param: The expression AST.
The original source text.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.CompilerVisitor
member.summary: Internal visitor that holds compilation state. A new instance is created for each compilation to ensure thread safety.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.ExpressionParser
member.summary: Parses ABML expressions into AST nodes using Parlot.
member.remarks:
Grammar (precedence low to high):
expression = ternary ternary = nullCoalesce ("?" expression ":" expression)? nullCoalesce = or ("??" or)* or = and ("||" and)* and = equality ("&&" equality)* equality = comparison (("==" | "!=") comparison)* comparison = term (("<" | "<=" | ">" | ">=") term)* term = factor (("+" | "-") factor)* factor = unary (("*" | "/" | "%") unary)* unary = ("!" | "-") unary | membership membership = postfix ("in" postfix)? postfix = primary (("." IDENT) | ("[" expression "]") | ("?." IDENT) | ("?[" expression "]") | ("(" args ")"))* primary = "null" | "true" | "false" | NUMBER | STRING | IDENT | "(" expression ")"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.ExpressionParser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses an expression string into an AST.
member.param: The expression to parse.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.ExpressionParser.TryParse(System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.Ast.ExpressionNode@)
member.summary: Tries to parse an expression string into an AST.
member.param: The expression to parse.
The parsed AST if successful.
member.returns: True if parsing succeeded, false otherwise.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode
member.summary: ABML bytecode operation codes.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.LoadConst
member.summary: R[A] = constants[B]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.LoadVar
member.summary: R[A] = scope.GetVariable(constants[B])

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.LoadNull
member.summary: R[A] = null

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.LoadTrue
member.summary: R[A] = true

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.LoadFalse
member.summary: R[A] = false

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Move
member.summary: R[A] = R[B]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.GetProp
member.summary: R[A] = R[B].GetProperty(constants[C])

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.GetPropSafe
member.summary: R[A] = R[B]?.GetProperty(constants[C])

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.GetIndex
member.summary: R[A] = R[B][R[C]]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Add
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] + R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Sub
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] - R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Mul
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] * R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Div
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] / R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Mod
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] % R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Neg
member.summary: R[A] = -R[B]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Eq
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] == R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Ne
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] != R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Lt
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] < R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Le
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] <= R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Gt
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] > R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Ge
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] >= R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Not
member.summary: R[A] = !R[B]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.And
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] && R[C] (non-short-circuit, use jumps for short-circuit)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Or
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] || R[C] (non-short-circuit)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.ToBool
member.summary: R[A] = IsTrue(R[B]) - explicit boolean conversion

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfTrue
member.summary: if R[A] is truthy then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfFalse
member.summary: if R[A] is falsy then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfNull
member.summary: if R[A] == null then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfNotNull
member.summary: if R[A] != null then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.CallArgs
member.summary: Specifies arg count for following Call. A = argCount

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Call
member.summary: R[A] = Call(constants[B], args starting at R[C])
member.remarks: Must be preceded by CallArgs instruction that specifies arg count. B encodes function name index in constants. Args are in R[C], R[C+1], ..., R[C+argCount-1].

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Coalesce
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] ?? R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.In
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] in R[C]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Concat
member.summary: R[A] = concat(R[B], R[C])

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Compiler.OpCode.Return
member.summary: Return R[A]

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Documents.Actions.ContinuationPointAction
member.summary: Continuation point for streaming composition. Allows extensions to attach during execution.

remarks.para: When execution reaches a continuation point: 1. If an extension is attached, control transfers to the extension 2. Otherwise, waits up to Timeout for an extension to arrive 3. If timeout expires, executes DefaultFlow
This enables THE_DREAM pattern: game server receives complete cinematic, starts executing, and Event Brain can optionally extend mid-execution.

member.param: Unique name for this continuation point.
Maximum time to wait for extension (e.g., "2s", "500ms").
Flow to execute if no extension arrives.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Documents.Actions.ContinuationPointAction.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Continuation point for streaming composition. Allows extensions to attach during execution.

remarks.para: When execution reaches a continuation point: 1. If an extension is attached, control transfers to the extension 2. Otherwise, waits up to Timeout for an extension to arrive 3. If timeout expires, executes DefaultFlow
This enables THE_DREAM pattern: game server receives complete cinematic, starts executing, and Event Brain can optionally extend mid-execution.

member.param: Unique name for this continuation point.
Maximum time to wait for extension (e.g., "2s", "500ms").
Flow to execute if no extension arrives.

member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\$\\{([^}]+)\\}
Explanation:
Match the string "${".
1st capture group.
Match a character other than '}' atomically at least once.
Match '}'.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Abml.Execution.ValueEvaluator
member.summary: Utility for evaluating action parameter values. Handles the distinction between literal values and expression values.

remarks.para: Values containing ${...} are evaluated as expressions. Plain values are parsed as literals (numbers, booleans, null, or strings).

Examples:
"Hello" string "Hello"
"42" int 42
"3.14" double 3.14
"true" bool true
"null" null
"${x + 1}" evaluated expression result
"Hello ${name}" interpolated template result

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.BaseClientEvent
member.summary: Base class for all server-to-client push events delivered via WebSocket. All client events MUST inherit from this class and include these fields. The eventName field is used for whitelist validation in Connect service.

remarks.para: This class is the single source of truth for base client event properties. It is excluded from NSwag generation (like ApiException) to avoid duplicate definitions. All derived events generated via NSwag will inherit from this class.
Implements IBannouEvent for uniform event handling in message taps.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.BaseClientEvent.EventName
P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.BaseClientEvent.EventId

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ClientEventNormalizer
member.summary:
Normalizes client event names from their potentially mangled form (from JSON serialization) back to canonical whitelist format.
NSwag/JsonStringEnumConverter converts event names like "system.notification" to "system_notification" or "System_notification". This class maps these mangled names back to their canonical form for: 1. Validation against the whitelist 2. Rewriting the event_name in the payload before sending to clients

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ClientEventNormalizer.TryGetCanonicalName(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to normalize an event name from its potentially mangled form to canonical form.
member.param: The event name as received (possibly mangled, e.g., "system_notification")
The canonical name if valid (e.g., "system.notification")
member.returns: True if the event is valid and was normalized, false if not in whitelist

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ClientEventNormalizer.IsValidEventName(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an event name (possibly mangled) is valid according to the whitelist.
member.param: The event name to check
member.returns: True if valid (in whitelist), false otherwise

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ClientEventNormalizer.NormalizeEventPayload(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Normalizes the event_name field in a JSON payload to its canonical form. If the event is not in the whitelist, returns null.
member.param: The JSON event payload bytes
member.returns: Tuple of (canonicalEventName, normalizedPayload) if valid, or (null, originalPayload) if event not in whitelist or parsing fails

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ClientEventNormalizer.RewriteEventName(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rewrites the event_name property in a JSON object to a new value.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.IClientEventPublisher
member.summary: Interface for publishing events to specific WebSocket clients via session-specific channels. Services use this to push events to clients without knowing which Connect instance handles them.

remarks.para: Events are published to RabbitMQ topics named CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId}. The Connect service subscribes to these topics and forwards events to the appropriate WebSocket.
All events must have a valid event_name that exists in the ClientEventWhitelist. Events with invalid names will be rejected by the publisher.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.IClientEventPublisher.PublishToSessionAsync``1(System.String,``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Publishes an event to a specific client session.
member.typeparam: Type of client event (must inherit from BaseClientEvent).
member.param: The target session ID.
The event data to publish.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: True if the event was published successfully, false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown if the event name is not in the whitelist.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.IClientEventPublisher.PublishToSessionsAsync``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},``0,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Publishes an event to multiple client sessions.
member.typeparam: Type of client event (must inherit from BaseClientEvent).
member.param: The target session IDs.
The event data to publish.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: The number of sessions the event was successfully published to.
member.exception: Thrown if the event name is not in the whitelist.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.IClientEventPublisher.IsValidEventName(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an event name is valid (exists in the whitelist).
member.param: The event name to check.
member.returns: True if the event name is valid.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.MessageBusClientEventPublisher
member.summary: Message bus implementation of IClientEventPublisher. Publishes client events to session-specific RabbitMQ queues via MassTransit.

remarks.para: Uses a dedicated direct exchange ("bannou-client-events") with routing keys to deliver events only to the target session's queue. The routing key is the queue name (CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId}).

This architecture ensures: - No per-session exchange proliferation (single shared direct exchange) - Efficient broker-level message filtering (only matching queues receive events) - Clean separation from service events which use the "bannou" fanout exchange

The Connect service uses direct RabbitMQ to subscribe because MassTransit doesn't support dynamic runtime queue creation. Session queues have 5-minute TTL applied via RabbitMQ policy for automatic cleanup.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.MessageBusClientEventPublisher.SESSION_TOPIC_PREFIX
member.summary: Prefix for session-specific queue names and routing keys.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.MessageBusClientEventPublisher.CLIENT_EVENTS_EXCHANGE
member.summary: The dedicated direct exchange for client events. Defined in provisioning/rabbitmq/definitions.json.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.MessageBusClientEventPublisher.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IMessageBus,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.MessageBusClientEventPublisher})
member.summary: Creates a new MessageBusClientEventPublisher.
member.param: Message bus for publishing events.
Logger for event operations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.MessageBusClientEventPublisher.GetEventName``1(``0)
member.summary: Extracts the event name from a client event, handling NSwag-generated enum shadowing.

remarks.para: NSwag generates derived event classes that shadow the base Event_name (string) property with an enum property (e.g., CapabilityManifestEventEvent_name). When accessing Event_name via the BaseClientEvent constraint, we get the base string property which may be unset.
This method uses reflection to find the actual Event_name property on the runtime type and extracts the correct string value, handling EnumMember attributes for enum values.

member.param: The event instance.
member.returns: The event name string, or null if not found.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Configuration.BannouJson
member.summary:
Static helper for JSON serialization/deserialization that always uses Bannou's standard configuration. This is the SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH for JSON serialization settings across all Bannou services and SDKs.
USE THIS INSTEAD OF JsonSerializer.Deserialize/Serialize DIRECTLY.
This ensures consistent behavior across the codebase: - Case-insensitive property matching (handles both PascalCase and camelCase) - Enums serialize as strings matching C# enum names (e.g., "GettingStarted") - Null values are ignored when writing - Strict number handling (no string-to-number coercion) - Proper handling of all Bannou model types
Example usage: var model = BannouJson.Deserialize<MyModel>(jsonString); var json = BannouJson.Serialize(model);

member.summary: Standard JSON serializer options used throughout Bannou. This is the canonical configuration - all JSON operations should use this.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.EventSubscriptionRegistry
member.summary: Static registry mapping topic names to event types. Required because IEventConsumer handlers are stored as object-typed delegates.

remarks.para: The IEventConsumer stores handlers as Func<IServiceProvider, object, Task> - type information is lost after registration. This registry provides the topictype mapping needed by NativeEventConsumerBackend to deserialize incoming messages.

IMPORTANT: This registry MUST be populated before NativeEventConsumerBackend starts. Use the auto-generated EventSubscriptionRegistration.RegisterAll() method during application startup, or manually register event types in plugin initialization.
This class is thread-safe and supports idempotent registration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.EventSubscriptionRegistry.Register``1(System.String)
member.summary: Register a topiceventType mapping. Called during service initialization (before subscriptions start).
member.typeparam: The event type for this topic
member.param: The topic/routing key name (e.g., "session.connected")
member.remarks: Registration is idempotent - registering the same topic multiple times with the same type is safe. However, registering a topic with a different type will overwrite the previous mapping and log a warning.

member.param: The topic/routing key name
member.returns: The registered event type, or null if not registered

member.summary: Base interface for all Bannou events (both service-to-service and client events). All events in the system implement this interface, enabling uniform handling in message taps and event processing pipelines.

remarks.para: This interface defines the minimal contract for all events: - EventId: Unique identifier for deduplication and tracing - Timestamp: When the event was created

member.summary: Unique identifier for this event instance (as string). Used for deduplication, tracing, and correlation.

member.summary: When the event was created (UTC).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.IEventConsumer
member.summary: Service for registering and dispatching Bannou pub/sub events across all plugins. This provides an application-level fan-out layer on top of RabbitMQ's topic routing limitation.

remarks.para: RabbitMQ only allows ONE consumer group to subscribe to a topic per app-id. When multiple plugins want to handle the same event, only one receives it. This service solves that by:

list.item: Having generated controllers push events into this singleton service
Dispatching to ALL registered handlers across all plugins
Isolating handler failures so one throwing doesn't prevent others from running

remarks.para: Registration uses a factory pattern to avoid capturing stale service instances. When dispatching, fresh service instances are resolved from the request scope.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.IEventConsumer.Register``1(System.String,System.String,System.Func{System.IServiceProvider,``0,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Registers an event handler for a specific topic.
member.param: The message topic name (e.g., "session.connected").
Unique key to prevent duplicate registrations (e.g., "permissions:session.connected").
Factory that takes IServiceProvider and event, resolves the service, and calls the handler. The factory should resolve services from the provided scope, not capture constructor instances.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.IEventConsumer.DispatchAsync``1(System.String,``0,System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Dispatches an event to all registered handlers for the topic.
member.param: The message topic name.
The event data.
The DI scope for the current request (used to resolve services).
member.returns: Task that completes when all handlers have been invoked.
member.remarks: Handler failures are logged but do not prevent other handlers from running. All handlers are invoked even if some throw exceptions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.IEventConsumer.GetRegisteredTopics
member.summary: Gets all registered topic names for diagnostic purposes.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.IEventConsumer.GetHandlerCount(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the number of handlers registered for a topic.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent
member.summary:
Published periodically by Orchestrator as the authoritative source of truth
for all service-to-app-id mappings across the entire network.
Consumed by all bannou instances to atomically update their routing tables.
Published every 30 seconds AND immediately when routing changes.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.Mappings
member.summary: Complete dictionary of serviceName -> appId mappings

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.DefaultAppId
member.summary: Default app-id for unmapped services (usually "bannou")

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.Version
member.summary: Monotonically increasing version for ordering. Consumers reject events with version <= current.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.SourceInstanceId
member.summary: Orchestrator instance GUID that published this event

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.TotalServices
member.summary: Total number of services in the mappings dictionary

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket connection is fully established.
This event ensures the RabbitMQ exchange exists before any service publishes
to the session-specific topic (CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId}).
Permissions service uses this to track activeConnections and compile capabilities.
The roles and authorizations enable event-driven capability compilation without
synchronous API calls from Connect to Permissions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID that just connected via WebSocket

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.AccountId
member.summary: Account ID owning the session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.Roles
member.summary: User roles from JWT (e.g., ["user", "admin"]). Used by Permissions to compile capabilities.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.Authorizations
member.summary: Authorization states from JWT (e.g., ["arcadia:authorized"]). Format is "serviceId:state".

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.ConnectInstanceId
member.summary: Connect service instance handling this connection (for debugging)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.ClientInfo
member.summary: Optional client metadata (version, platform, etc.)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket connection is closed.
Used by Permissions service to remove session from activeConnections.
Also enables cleanup of session-specific resources across services.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID that disconnected

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.AccountId
member.summary: Account ID that was disconnected

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.Reason
member.summary: Disconnect reason (logout, timeout, error, server_shutdown)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.Reconnectable
member.summary: Whether session can reconnect within the reconnection window

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.DurationSeconds
member.summary: How long the session was connected (for metrics)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket session is restored after reconnection.
Services should subscribe to this event to re-publish any session shortcuts they
previously granted, as shortcuts are cleared on disconnect and do not persist.
**Session Shortcuts Re-publication:**
Services that publish session shortcuts should listen for this event and re-evaluate
whether the session should receive shortcuts again (e.g., check subscription status,
game state, etc.) and publish new ShortcutPublishedEvents as appropriate.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID that reconnected

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.AccountId
member.summary: Account ID owning the reconnected session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.Roles
member.summary: User roles preserved from previous session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.Authorizations
member.summary: Authorization states preserved from previous session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.PreviousDisconnectAt
member.summary: When the previous connection was lost

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.ReconnectionContext
member.summary: Optional context from the reconnection (client info, etc.)

member.summary:
Event published to specific Connect service instances (CONNECT_{session_id} channel).
Contains compiled permission capabilities for a session with optional delta updates.

member.summary: Session ID that had capability changes

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.PermissionCapabilityUpdate.Version
member.summary: New capability version number (increments on each update)

member.summary: Type of update - full capabilities or delta changes

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.PermissionCapabilityUpdate.FullCapabilities
P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.PermissionCapabilityUpdate.AddedCapabilities
member.summary:
New capabilities added to the session (for delta updates).
Same format as fullCapabilities.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.PermissionCapabilityUpdate.RemovedCapabilities
member.summary:
Capabilities removed from the session (for delta updates).
Same format as fullCapabilities.

member.summary: When these capabilities were compiled

member.summary: When these capabilities expire and need refresh

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.PermissionCapabilityUpdate.Reason
member.summary: Reason for the capability update

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ExtensionMethods.REGEX_InvalidChars
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s-]
Explanation:
Match a character in the set [^-0-9A-Za-z\s].

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ExtensionMethods.REGEX_Spaces
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\s
Explanation:
Match a whitespace character.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ExtensionMethods.REGEX_MultipleSpaces
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\s+
Explanation:
Match a whitespace character atomically at least once.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RequestUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.UploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request upload URL for a new asset
member.remarks:
Generate a pre-signed URL for uploading a new asset directly to storage.
For large files (>50MB), returns multipart upload configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CompleteUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CompleteUploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Mark upload as complete, trigger processing
member.remarks:
Called after the client has uploaded the file to the pre-signed URL.
Triggers the asset processing pipeline (texture conversion, model validation, etc.)
and emits completion events via WebSocket.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetAssetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetAssetRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get asset metadata and download URL
member.remarks:
Retrieve asset metadata and generate a pre-signed download URL.
Specify version to download a specific version, or omit for latest.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.ListAssetVersionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ListVersionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all versions of an asset
member.remarks:
Retrieve version history for an asset with pagination.
Includes version IDs, creation timestamps, and archive status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.SearchAssetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetSearchRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Search assets by tags, type, or realm
member.remarks:
Search assets using various filters with pagination.
All filters are optional and combine with AND logic.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CreateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create asset bundle from multiple assets
member.remarks:
Create a .bannou bundle containing multiple assets.
For large bundles, processing is delegated to the processing pool.
Completion notification sent via WebSocket event.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get bundle manifest and download URL
member.remarks:
Retrieve bundle metadata and generate a pre-signed download URL.
Supports both native .bannou format and ZIP conversion (cached).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RequestBundleUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BundleUploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request upload URL for a pre-made bundle
member.remarks:
Upload a pre-built bundle (.bannou or .zip format).
After upload, the bundle undergoes validation before registration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.InitOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Initialize OAuth2 flow (browser redirect)
member.remarks:
Browser-facing endpoint for initiating OAuth flows. The user's browser navigates
to this URL directly, which then redirects to the OAuth provider.
**Note**: This endpoint uses GET with path parameters because it's a browser
redirect flow, not a WebSocket-routed API call.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.CompleteOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.OAuthCallbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Complete OAuth2 flow (browser redirect callback)
member.remarks:
Browser-facing callback endpoint for OAuth providers. The OAuth provider redirects
the user's browser back to this URL after authentication.
**Note**: This endpoint uses path parameters because the callback URL is registered
with OAuth providers and cannot be changed without updating provider configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.VerifySteamAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Verify Steam Session Ticket
member.remarks:
Validates a Steam Session Ticket obtained from the game client via ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
The server validates the ticket with Steam's Web API and retrieves the SteamID from Steam's response.
NEVER trust client-provided SteamID - it must come from Steam's authenticated response.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest
member.summary:
Request to verify a Steam Session Ticket. The ticket is obtained client-side via
ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi("bannou"). SteamID is NOT included because
it must be obtained from Steam's Web API response (never trust client-provided SteamID).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest.Ticket
member.summary:
Hex-encoded Steam Session Ticket from ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
Client converts ticket bytes to hex string: BitConverter.ToString(ticketData).Replace("-", "")

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.CompileAbmlBehaviorAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Compile ABML behavior definition
member.remarks:
Compiles a YAML-based ABML behavior definition into executable behavior trees.
Handles stackable behavior sets, cultural adaptations, and context variable resolution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.CompileBehaviorStackAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.BehaviorStackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Compile stackable behavior sets
member.remarks:
Compiles multiple ABML behavior sets with priority-based merging.
Handles cultural adaptations, profession specializations, and context resolution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.ValidateAbmlAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Validate ABML definition
member.remarks:
Validates ABML YAML against schema and checks for semantic correctness.
Includes context variable validation and service dependency checking.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.GetCachedBehaviorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.GetCachedBehaviorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get cached compiled behavior
member.remarks:
Retrieves a previously compiled behavior from the cache.
Used for performance optimization in high-frequency behavior execution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.InvalidateCachedBehaviorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.InvalidateCacheRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Invalidate cached behavior
member.remarks:
Removes a behavior from the cache, forcing recompilation on next access.
Used when behavior definitions are updated.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.ResolveContextVariablesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.ResolveContextRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Resolve context variables
member.remarks:
Resolves context variables in ABML definitions against character and world state.
Used for dynamic behavior adaptation based on current game state.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.GenerateGoapPlanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.GoapPlanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Generate GOAP plan
member.remarks:
Generates a GOAP plan to achieve a goal from the current world state.
Uses A* search to find the optimal sequence of actions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.IBehaviorClient.ValidateGoapPlanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.ValidateGoapPlanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Validate existing GOAP plan
member.remarks:
Validates an existing GOAP plan against the current world state.
Returns whether the plan is still valid or needs replanning.

member.summary:
Optional human-readable name for the behavior.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.CompileBehaviorRequest.BehaviorCategory
member.summary:
Category for organizing behaviors (e.g., profession, cultural, situational).
Used for filtering and grouping in bundles.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Behavior.CompileBehaviorRequest.BundleId
member.summary:
Optional bundle identifier for grouping related behaviors.
When specified, the compiled behavior will be added to a bundle with this ID.
Clients can then download entire bundles for efficient bulk loading.
If the bundle doesn't exist, it will be created.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ProxyInternalRequestAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.InternalProxyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Internal API proxy for stateless requests
member.remarks:
Stateless HTTP proxy for internal requests that don't require persistent sessions.
Applies permission validation and rate limiting based on agent role and context.
Perfect for AI agents making one-off API calls or bulk operations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.GetClientCapabilitiesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.GetClientCapabilitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get client capability manifest (GUID API mappings)
member.remarks:
Returns the capability manifest for the authenticated client's session.
Maps client-salted GUIDs to available API endpoints based on the client's
current permissions and session state.
**Security**: Each client receives unique GUIDs for the same API endpoints.
This prevents cross-session exploitation and enables per-client rate limiting.
**Dynamic Updates**: Capabilities may change during a session when:
- Role changes occur (admin promotion, etc.)
- Subscription status changes
- Session state transitions
Clients should listen for capability update events via WebSocket to stay current.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Establish WebSocket connection
member.remarks:
Initiates a WebSocket connection for real-time communication.
Requires JWT authentication via Authorization header.
**Connection Flow:**
1. Send HTTP GET request with `Connection: Upgrade` and `Upgrade: websocket` headers
2. Include `Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>` header for authentication
3. Server validates JWT and extracts user claims (roles, scopes, services)
4. Connection upgrades to WebSocket protocol
5. Client can send binary messages using the custom protocol
**Reconnection:**
For existing sessions, use `Authorization: Reconnect <reconnect_token>` instead.
member.param: Must be "Upgrade" to initiate WebSocket connection
Must be "websocket" to specify protocol upgrade

JWT Bearer token for new connections: "Bearer <jwt_token>"
Reconnect token for existing sessions: "Reconnect <reconnect_token>"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketPostAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection2,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade2,System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Establish WebSocket connection (POST variant)
member.remarks:
Alternative POST method for establishing WebSocket connections.
Functionally identical to the GET method but supports clients that
require POST for WebSocket upgrades.
member.param: Optional connection parameters

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ResponseCodes
member.summary:
Response codes used in the binary protocol for success/error indication.
Provides fine-grained error reporting for different failure scenarios.
**Shortcut-specific error codes (70-79):**
- 70 (ShortcutExpired): Session shortcut has expired (TTL exceeded)
- 71 (ShortcutTargetNotFound): Shortcut's target capability no longer available
- 72 (ShortcutRevoked): Session shortcut was explicitly revoked

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service request message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Bytes 0: Message Flags (1 byte)
- Bytes 1-2: Channel ID (2 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 3-6: Sequence Number (4 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 7-22: Service GUID (16 bytes)
- Bytes 23-30: Message ID (8 bytes)
- Bytes 31+: Payload (variable length)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Channel
member.summary: Channel for sequential message processing (0-65535, 0 = default)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Per-channel sequence number for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.ServiceGuid
member.summary: Client-salted service GUID for routing

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Unique message ID for request/response correlation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Payload
member.summary: Message payload (JSON or binary data based on flags)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service response message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Same as ServiceRequestMessage but with Response flag (0x40) set

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.VoiceConnectionInfo
member.summary:
Minimal voice metadata returned when joining a session.
**Event-Only Pattern**: Peer connection details are NOT included here.
Clients receive VoicePeerJoinedEvent when other peers join (with their SDP offers).
This avoids race conditions between response processing and event handling.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListLocationsByParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListLocationsByParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get child locations for a parent location
member.remarks:
Retrieve all locations that have the specified location as their parent.
Useful for getting all cities in a region, all buildings in a city, etc.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListRootLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListRootLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get root locations in a realm
member.remarks:
Returns all top-level locations in a realm (locations with no parent).
These are typically regions or major areas within the realm.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.GetLocationAncestorsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.GetLocationAncestorsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all ancestors of a location
member.remarks:
Returns the full ancestry chain from the specified location up to the
root location (parentLocationId=null). For example, for a specific building
might return [district, city, region].

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.GetLocationDescendantsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.GetLocationDescendantsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all descendants of a location
member.remarks:
Returns all locations that are descendants of the specified location
(direct children, grandchildren, etc.). Useful for finding all places
within a region or city.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create new location

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update location

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SetLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SetLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Set or change the parent of a location
member.remarks:
Update a location's parent, moving it in the hierarchy.
Validates that:
- New parent exists and is in the same realm
- No circular reference would be created
- Updates depth for location and all descendants

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.RemoveLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.RemoveLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Remove parent from a location (make it a root location)
member.remarks:
Remove the parent of a location, making it a top-level root location
within its realm. Updates depth for location and all descendants.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeleteLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeleteLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete location
member.remarks:
Hard delete a location. This will fail if the location:
- Has child locations (must delete or reparent children first)
- Is still referenced by other entities
For safe removal, first deprecate the location, remove all children,
then delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deprecate a location
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a location by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated locations:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for placing new entities
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.UndeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.UndeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated location
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a location, making it
available for entity placement again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.LocationExistsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationExistsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if location exists and is active
member.remarks:
Fast validation endpoint for other services to check location validity.
Returns true if location exists and is not deprecated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SeedLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SeedLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed locations from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed locations from provided data.
Creates locations that don't exist, optionally updates existing locations.
Processes locations in dependency order (parents before children).
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined location hierarchies.

member.summary: Deprecate a location
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a location by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated locations:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for placing new entities
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationClient.UndeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.UndeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restore a deprecated location
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a location, making it
available for entity placement again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationClient.LocationExistsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationExistsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if location exists and is active
member.remarks:
Fast validation endpoint for other services to check location validity.
Returns true if location exists and is not deprecated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationClient.SeedLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SeedLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Seed locations from configuration
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed locations from provided data.
Creates locations that don't exist, optionally updates existing locations.
Processes locations in dependency order (parents before children).
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined location hierarchies.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Register a service endpoint
member.remarks:
Registers this instance's endpoint in the service mesh.
Called during service startup to announce availability.
Endpoint TTL is refreshed on each heartbeat.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update endpoint health and load
member.remarks:

Should be called periodically (default: every 30 seconds).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ServiceRestartRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Restart service with optional configuration
member.remarks:
Performs intelligent service restart based on health metrics.
Only restarts if truly necessary (e.g., 5+ minute degradation).
Supports optional environment variable updates during restart.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ShouldRestartServiceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ShouldRestartServiceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if service needs restart
member.remarks:
Evaluates service health and determines if restart is necessary.
Restart logic:
- Healthy: No restart needed
- Degraded < 5 min: No restart needed
- Degraded > 5 min: Restart recommended
- Unavailable: Restart needed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetBackendsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListBackendsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Detect available container orchestration backends
member.remarks:
Detects which container orchestration backends are available on this system.
Returns availability status and capabilities for each backend.
**Priority Order** (for automatic selection):
1. Kubernetes - Full cluster orchestration with operators
2. Portainer - API abstraction over Compose/Swarm with web UI
3. Docker Swarm - Native Docker cluster orchestration
4. Docker Compose - Single-host container management
Detection methods:
- Kubernetes: Check for kubectl and cluster connectivity
- Portainer: Check for Portainer API endpoint
- Swarm: Check `docker info` for swarm mode
- Compose: Check for docker compose v2 availability

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPresetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ListPresetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List available deployment presets
member.remarks:
Returns all available deployment presets from the orchestrator's preset directory.
Presets define service combinations and configuration for specific use cases.
Built-in presets:
- `local-development`: All services in single container with mesh infrastructure
- `local-testing`: Test environment with infrastructure services
- `integration-http`: HTTP integration testing preset
- `integration-edge`: WebSocket/edge testing preset
- `split-auth-accounts`: Auth and Accounts in separate containers
- `distributed-npc`: NPC processing distributed across nodes

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.DeployAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.DeployRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Deploy or update an environment
member.remarks:
Deploys a complete environment using a preset or custom configuration.
Supports graceful transitions, forced deployments, and clean rebuilds.
**Deployment Modes**:
- `graceful`: Wait for existing connections to drain before changing topology
- `force`: Immediately apply changes (may interrupt active connections)
- `clean`: Tear down completely and rebuild from scratch
**Backend Selection**:
- If `backend` not specified, uses highest-priority available backend
- If `backend` specified but unavailable, returns error (no fallback)
**Live Topology Changes**:
Supports changing service distribution without full restart:
- Move auth/accounts to separate container while keeping other services together
- Scale specific services to additional nodes
- Update environment variables without restart (where supported)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetServiceRoutingAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetServiceRoutingRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current service-to-app-id routing mappings
member.remarks:
Returns the current service-to-app-id routing mappings used for mesh service invocation through lib-mesh.
This is the authoritative source of truth for how services are routed in the current deployment.
In development, all services route to "bannou" by default. In production, services may be
distributed across multiple app-ids based on deployment topology.
**Use Cases**:
- Services querying routing on startup
- Debugging service communication issues
- Monitoring deployment topology

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current environment status
member.remarks:
Returns comprehensive status of the current deployment including:
- Active backend and deployment configuration
- Service topology (which services on which containers)
- Container health and resource usage
- Infrastructure component status
- Active preset and any customizations

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.TeardownAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TeardownRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Tear down the current environment
member.remarks:
Tears down all containers and services in the current deployment.
Optionally preserves volumes and networks for faster redeployment.
**Teardown Modes**:
- `graceful`: Signal shutdown and wait for clean exit
- `force`: Immediately stop all containers (SIGKILL)
- `preserve-data`: Keep volumes and networks, only remove containers

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Clean up unused resources
member.remarks:
Prunes unused Docker resources to reclaim disk space and clean up
orphaned containers, networks, volumes, and images.
Equivalent to running various `docker system prune` commands.
**Clean Targets**:
- `containers`: Remove stopped containers
- `networks`: Remove unused networks
- `volumes`: Remove unused volumes (CAUTION: data loss)
- `images`: Remove dangling images
- `all`: All of the above

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetLogsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetLogsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get service/container logs
member.remarks:
Retrieves logs from services or containers with filtering options.
Supports real-time streaming via WebSocket upgrade.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.UpdateTopologyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.TopologyUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update service topology without full redeploy
member.remarks:
Changes which services run on which containers without tearing down
the entire environment. Enables live topology changes.
**Use Cases**:
- Move auth service to dedicated container for scaling
- Consolidate services during low-traffic periods
- Split services for debugging/isolation
- Add new service nodes to running environment

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RequestContainerRestartAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ContainerRestartRequestBody,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request container restart (self-service pattern)
member.remarks:
Plugins call this endpoint to request restart of their own container.
This is part of the self-service configuration update pattern where
plugins decide if they care about config changes and request restarts.
**Flow**:
1. Orchestrator publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent with changed keys
2. Plugins check if any changed keys match their dependencies
3. Plugins that care call this endpoint to request restart
4. Orchestrator performs rolling restart of requested containers
**Priority Levels**:
- `graceful`: Rolling update, wait for healthy before cycling next instance
- `immediate`: Rolling update but don't wait for connection drain
- `force`: Kill all instances simultaneously (causes downtime)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetContainerStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetContainerStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container health and restart history
member.remarks:
Returns detailed status of a container including health, restart history,
running plugins, and current configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.RollbackConfigurationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ConfigRollbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Rollback to previous configuration
member.remarks:
Quickly rollback to the previous configuration without waiting for CI.
Swaps currentConfig with previousConfig and publishes ConfigurationChangedEvent
with the reverted keys so services can request restart.
**Note**: This is a quick fix. GitHub secrets should still be corrected
to prevent re-breaking on next orchestrator deploy.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetConfigVersionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetConfigVersionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get current configuration version and metadata
member.remarks:
Returns the current configuration version, last update time,
and summary of configuration state (not actual values for security).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.AcquireProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.AcquireProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Acquire a processor from a pool
member.remarks:
Requests an available processor instance from the specified pool type.
Returns the app-id of an available processor or 429 if none available.
The processor is marked as busy until explicitly released.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ReleaseProcessorAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ReleaseProcessorRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Release a processor back to the pool
member.remarks:
Releases a previously acquired processor, making it available for other requests.
Should be called when processing is complete or on error cleanup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.GetPoolStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.GetPoolStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get processing pool status
member.remarks:
Returns current status of a processing pool including:
- Total instances (running and available)
- Current utilization
- Queue depth (waiting requests)
- Recent processing metrics

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.ScalePoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.ScalePoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Scale a processing pool
member.remarks:
Manually adjust the size of a processing pool.
Can scale up (add instances) or scale down (remove idle instances).
Respects min/max constraints from pool configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.IOrchestratorClient.CleanupPoolAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Orchestrator.CleanupPoolRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Cleanup idle processing pool instances
member.remarks:
Scales pool back to minimum instances by removing idle processors.
Used for resource reclamation during low-activity periods.
